description:
Learn the Basic Concepts of App Development i.e. LOGIC with Swift language to develop apps for App store using Apples Smooth, Simple and matured development environment XCode.

 Build the Strong Foundation in iPhone/iPad App development.

  •  Learn to  Use XCode 7.x, understand  swift 2.x and explore  IOS 9.x  
  • You will learn LOGIC, Language and Framework to develop more than 20 apps.
  • Included with course XCode project files, slides, assets and project in eBook format.
  • Practice exercises at end of sections enforce the concepts in mind.

 

What cannot be covered with 40 hrs of video is covered here with less than 20 hrs of video, this is where I have utilized my 20 years’ experience of teaching 1000’s of candidates for vendor certification courses in programming.

I have used my time tested method of teaching i.e. explaining, demonstrating and practicing, you will learn by doing and developing the apps.

We will be developing more than 20 apps from simple to intermediate to more practical apps.

I will be walking through the entire app building process step by step and will fix the programming LOGIC in your mind and you take on from there by practicing exercises (solutions included).

I have provided all the resources to make learning easier and fun and guided where and how you can obtain these resources for future development needs.

 You will learn various prebuilt object also called as controls which are available in IOS SDK. I tried to cover each and everything available in swift and ios sdk with small sample code and have fully explained before using them in apps.

You will learn all this using small Code Snippets to understand how to use each object and develop confidence in developing apps.

 Have a look at preview of apps and course curriculum to find the details of course contents.

 

 You will start as fresher but by the end of this course you will have full confidence in developing apps for Appstore and you will definitely be making real world apps and money too.
title: Developing iPhone/iPad App's - Fresher Series
